translation.en: GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: It's okay, son...
I know you want this to be over.
translation.it: Lo so che vorresti fosse tutto finito.

translation.en: I'm right here.
I will be right here...
But, you don't give up.
You hear me?
As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.it: Finché hai un alito di vita, combatti.

translation.en: You breathe... keep breathing.
GLASS [WHISPERS IN ENGLISH]: Hawk.
Ah, shit.
Goddamn sumbitches.
The sumbitch got shit for brains.
translation.it: Quegli stronzi hanno la merda al posto del cervello.

translation.en: -You seen Coulter? TRAPPER: Nope.
Listen up!
When them plews is cleaned, I want you to hoop 'em up real tight.
translation.it: Quando avrete pulito le pelli, voglio che le tendiate bene.

translation.en: Remember, we're not doing no 15-pelt bales!
translation.it: Ricordate che non stiamo preparando balle da 15 pelli!

translation.en: -We're doing 30-pelt bales! HENRY: Fitzgerald!
Cap'n.
Where are we with the haul? What are you thinking?
translation.it: A che punto siamo col trasporto? Che ne pensi?

translation.en: I'm thinking, whatever it is they're hunting out there...
translation.it: Penso che qualsiasi cosa stiano cacciando,

translation.en: ...I hope it don't need another shot.
translation.it: è meglio se la fanno secca al primo colpo.

translation.en: Make sure we're ready to head out by dawn.
translation.it: Assicurati che siano pronti a partire all'alba.

translation.en: Been done by this morning.
I'd have liked to be out by now, but the men are too tired.
translation.it: Volevo partire, ma gli uomini sono stanchi.

translation.en: We're only a few days from the fort. We're trapped out.
translation.it: Siamo a pochi giorni dal forte. Siamo intrappolati.

translation.en: All we have to worry about is fresh meat for the boys.
translation.it: Dobbiamo solo pensare ad avere carne fresca per i ragazzi.

translation.en: Well, you, uh, seen Coulter?
JIM: Hey, we took down an elk. A big one.
translation.it: Ehi, abbiamo abbattuto un alce. Bello grosso.

translation.en: We need help to haul the meat back.
translation.it: Ci serve aiuto per portare la carne.

translation.en: Let me know when it's on the spit. I'll help you with it then.
translation.it: Chiedimelo quando sarà sullo spiedo. Ti aiuterò allora.

translation.en: Come on, I need your help.
translation.it: Andiamo, mi serve il vostro aiuto.

translation.en: We needed help when we were loading them bales.
translation.it: A noi serviva aiuto per caricare le balle.

translation.en: I been eating this damn beaver meat so long...
translation.it: Mangio carne di castoro da così tanto tempo

translation.en: ...I'm starting to miss my wife's cooking.
translation.it: che mi manca la cucina di mia moglie.

translation.en: -I'm starting to miss your wife. -Shut up.
translation.it: - A me inizia a mancare tua moglie. - Piantala.

translation.en: COULTER: Help!
Help.
TRAPPER 1: Is that Coulter?
You go get the Captain.
STUBBY BILL: Jesus Christ.
TRAPPER 2: Anybody see them?
TRAPPER 3: Stay quiet. TRAPPER 4: Watch the ridge.
HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: What was that?
Pa?
Let's go.
[WHISPERS] They got Thomas.
I can't see 'em. I can't see 'em.
HENRY: Get down!
We're surrounded! They're everywhere!
HENRY: Stay here! Stay here!
-They want us out in the open. TRAPPER 3: Someone get him help!
Nobody move! Stay where you are!
translation.it: Che nessuno si muova! Restate dove siete!

translation.en: They want the pelts. We got to get on that boat right now or we'll lose it all.
translation.it: Vogliono le pelli. Saliamo sulla barca o perderemo tutto.

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Get to the boat! To the boat, son! Move!
Move, move!
Leave the furs! Leave the furs! To the boat!
Grab some pelts! Come on, grab the pelts!
Grab the pelts! Grab the pelts!
DAVE: Give this to my little girl.
You're coming with us. I'll get help.
GLASS: Leave the furs! Leave the pelts!
translation.it: Lasciate le pellicce! Lasciate le pelli!

translation.en: -Lean on me. Just keep going. -Ahh!
translation.it: Appoggiati a me. Non ti fermare.

translation.en: Get to the boat!
Fucking savage!
Get on the fucking boat!
translation.it: Sali su quella cazzo di barca!

translation.en: Help!
HENRY: Cut the rope! Cut the rope!
Wait for Amos!
No! We go now!
Fire the cannon!
AMOS: Don't leave! Wait!
[IN ARIKARA] My daughter, Powaqa, is not here.
translation.it: Mia figlia Powaqa non è qui.

translation.en: Collect all the pelts we can carry.
translation.it: Raccogliete tutte le pelli che possiamo portare.

translation.en: We'll trade pelts with the French for horses and keep searching for her.
translation.it: Scambieremo le pelli con i francesi in cambio di cavalli e continueremo a cercarla.

translation.en: HENRY: --and dust becomes flour...
...and when the morning is clear...
translation.it: e, quando il mattino sarà limpido,

translation.en: ...this child of God will meet Jesus Christ himself. Amen.
translation.it: questo figlio di Dio incontrerà Gesù Cristo in persona. Amen.

translation.en: HENRY: You ready?
Hold still.
ANDERSON: Where did you learn that?
My father was a doctor. Bridger!
translation.it: Mio padre era un dottore. Bridger!

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Captain, we got a swarm of tree niggers... ...out here waiting to finish the job.
translation.it: Capitano, quel branco di scimmie rosse sono qui per finire il lavoro.

translation.en: Tell me you got some kind of plan.
translation.it: Dimmi che hai un qualche piano.

translation.en: Missouri's no good.
Not while the Ree's running it.
translation.it: Non finché gli indiani lo controllano.

translation.en: We got to get off this boat.
Oh, you want to get off the boat?
Then what do we do, huh?
Take our furs and sit out there amongst the Ree like a bunch of ducks?
translation.it: Prendiamo le pelli e facciamo da bersaglio per gli indiani?

translation.en: Only safe thing to do is track a new course back up on land.
translation.it: L'unica cosa sicura da fare è trovare un nuovo percorso via terra.

translation.en: That'll add weeks to the trip.
Better than floating where they can get eyes on us.
translation.it: Meglio che navigare dove ci possono vedere.

translation.en: They got eyes on you right now, son.
translation.it: Ti possono vedere anche ora, figliolo.

translation.en: What I'm saying is we stay on the boat.
translation.it: Io dico di rimanere sulla barca.

translation.en: Chart a course toward the fort and take our chances on the water.
translation.it: Facciamo rotta verso il forte e giochiamocela sul fiume.

translation.en: Glass knows this territory best. It's his job to get us home safe.
translation.it: Glass conosce questa zona meglio di noi. Portarci a casa sani e salvi è il suo lavoro.

translation.en: -Get us home safe? -Yeah. FITZGERALD: Need I remind you we already lost 32 men?
translation.it: A casa sani e salvi? Devo ricordarti che abbiamo già perso 32 uomini?

translation.en: It's 33 now. They were my men, Fitzgerald. I know how many I lost.
translation.it: Ora sono 33. Erano i miei uomini, Fitzgerald. So quanti ne ho persi.

translation.en: We do like Glass says. That's the end of it.
translation.it: Faremo come dice Glass. Fine del discorso.

translation.en: GLASS: We have to set the boat loose. If the Ree are tracking us, they'll find it downriver.
translation.it: Dobbiamo lasciare la barca. Se gli Arikara ci seguono, la troveranno a valle.

translation.en: Best course is to hike inland to the Grand and follow it to Fort Kiowa.
translation.it: Meglio arrivare a piedi al Grand e seguirne il corso fino a Fort Kiowa.

translation.en: On foot? It'll be winter before we get there.
translation.it: A piedi? Si sarà fatto inverno, prima del nostro arrivo.

translation.en: Yeah, unless we come across a post, trade for some horses.
translation.it: A meno che non scambiamo le pelli con dei cavalli a un avamposto.

translation.en: Ain't no posts that far over!
translation.it: Non ci sono avamposti, da quella parte!

translation.en: Captain, losing this boat is a goddamn mistake.
translation.it: Capitano, abbandonare la barca è un errore.

translation.en: The Ree ain't that stupid.
translation.it: Gli Arikara non sono così stupidi.

translation.en: We keep it, we can lay it up around Arrow's Peak.
Quit acting like you know what you're talking about.
translation.it: Non parlare di quello che non sai.

translation.en: Ain't nobody talking to you.
Who'd listen to you anyway?
Can't find your way out of your breeches to take a shit.
translation.it: Non trovi neanche la patta quando devi pisciare.

translation.en: All I'm saying is Camp Rhulen is just up the way.
translation.it: Dico solo che Camp Rhulen è in quella direzione.

translation.en: We can hole up there.
We walk.
Yeah, I'm sure we will.
Wish my dad was a doctor. Then he could've bought me a captain's job.
translation.it: Magari mio padre fosse stato dottore. Mi avrebbe comprato un impiego da capitano.

translation.en: What do we do, eh?
Pray these pelts ain't rotten if we ever get back here?
translation.it: Preghiamo che le pelli non siano marcite, per quando torneremo?

translation.en: HENRY: Make sure to mark this place. We're leaving a fortune under these rocks.
translation.it: Segnate bene il posto. Sotto queste rocce ci stiamo lasciando una fortuna.

translation.en: Glass, chart a course.
Tightest you can that gets us around the Ree.
translation.it: La più breve possibile che ci permetta di evitare gli Arikara.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: This ain't right.
We all know these furs ain't gonna be here by the time we come back.
translation.it: Sappiamo tutti che quelle pelli non ci saranno più, quando torneremo.

translation.en: There's no way we can haul them all the way to the fort.
translation.it: Non è possibile portarle fino al forte.

translation.en: Arikara are all through the territory. We'll want our hands free.
translation.it: Gli Arikara coprono tutto il territorio. Dobbiamo avere le mani libere.

translation.en: We're gonna lose those pelts.
-You rather keep the pelts or your life? -Life?
translation.it: - Preferisci le pelli alla vita? - La vita?

translation.en: What life you talking about? I ain't got no life.
translation.it: Di che vita parli? Non ho nessuna vita.

translation.en: I just got living and the only way I get that is through these pelts.
translation.it: Riesco a sopravvivere soltanto grazie a quelle pelli.

translation.en: Fuck!
Ain't no way I'm going home after six months working my ass off like a mule...
translation.it: Non tornerò a casa dopo essermi fatto il culo per sei mesi,

translation.en: ...risking my neck, men dying, and for what?
translation.it: rischiando la pelle, perdendo degli uomini, e per cosa?

translation.en: Damn near lost everything. Job's been fucked from the start!
translation.it: Abbiamo quasi perso tutto. La spedizione era una rovina in partenza!

translation.en: There's the one been fucking us.
translation.it: Ecco quello che ci ha rovinati.

translation.en: You wonder how the Ree got the dead drop on us...
translation.it: Vi chiedete perché gli Arikara sono riusciti a colpirci,

translation.en: ...when Mr. Glass was supposed to look out for that very thing?
translation.it: quando avevamo il sig. Glass a proteggerci?

translation.en: All them Pawnee buddies of his.
Pawnee's as much against the Ree as the rest of us.
translation.it: I Pawnee sono nemici degli Arikara quanto noi.

translation.en: Yeah?
Well, what about his little half-breed son?
translation.it: E che mi dici del suo figlioletto meticcio?

translation.en: What kind of savage you think his mama was?
translation.it: Che razza di selvaggia sarà stata la madre?

translation.en: Oh, lay off the boy, Fitz.
All I'm saying is...
...a savage is savage.
translation.it: un selvaggio è sempre un selvaggio.

translation.en: Hey, Glass...
...is it true what they say... ...about you shooting a lieutenant while living with them savages?
translation.it: è vero che hai sparato a un tenente, quando vivevi con quei selvaggi?

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Twenty-one dead soldiers and 40 dead feathernecks.
translation.it: Ventuno soldati morti contro 40 colli piumati.

translation.en: But you and your boy the only ones to walk out alive. Kind of a miracle.
translation.it: Tu e il tuo ragazzo siete i soli a esserne usciti vivi. Un miracolo.

translation.en: HENRY: Shut up, Fitzgerald.
FITZGERALD: Is that what you did? Shot one of your own to save this little dog here?
translation.it: L'hai fatto? Hai sparato a uno dei tuoi per salvare questo piccolo bastardo?

translation.en: Shut up!
Why? Was he playing with this little boy's mama, huh?
translation.it: Perché? Si ripassava la mammina del ragazzo?

translation.en: HENRY: Fitzgerald! -Did he kill her?
Hey, you can quit polishing that rifle when I'm talking to you.
translation.it: Smetti di lucidare il tuo fucile, quando ti parlo.

translation.en: I'm working on it.
You can work on it when I'm done talking to you.
translation.it: Puoi farlo dopo che avrò finito di parlarti.

translation.en: Look at me. HENRY: That's enough!
You're forgetting your place, boy.
translation.it: Dimentichi qual è il tuo posto, ragazzo.

translation.en: As far as I can tell, my place is here on the smart end of this rifle.
translation.it: Per quanto ne so, il mio posto è dalla parte giusta del fucile.

translation.en: HENRY: You move along, Fitzgerald.
That's an order!
Listen! There's only a couple hours of light left.
translation.it: Ascoltami! Ci restano solo un paio d'ore di luce.

translation.en: We got to stash these pelts and get rid of the boat. -Let's go! MAN: Yes, captain.
translation.it: Dobbiamo nascondere le pelli e liberarci della barca. Forza!

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I told you to be invisible, son.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di essere invisibile, figliolo.

translation.en: At least he...
--If you want to survive, keep your mouth shut.
translation.it: Se vuoi vivere, tieni la bocca chiusa!

translation.en: - At least he hear me... - They don't hear your voice!
translation.it: - Almeno mi ha sentito... - Non sentono la tua voce, figlio mio!

translation.en: They just see the color of your face.
translation.it: Vedono solo il colore del tuo volto.

translation.en: You understand?
Yes.
You have to listen to me, son.
You have to listen.
HENRY: Beckett!
JONES: Why are they not jumping?
STUBBY BILL: It looks like they changed their minds.
FITZGERALD: Smart sumbitches.
Smart.
I ought to be on that boat.
They did the right thing.
GLASS: It's time to move.
Get up.
We're headed out.
I'm coming.
It's better you lay down.
When the rest of the men are ready you send them to me.
translation.it: Quando gli altri sono pronti, digli di seguirmi.

translation.en: I'm going west.
You are my son.
WARRIOR 1 [IN ARIKARA]: There are only two here.
ELK DOG [IN ARIKARA]: Powaqa is not here.
WARRIOR 1: The others probably took her.
They went north.
ELK DOG: We'll pick up their tracks on the mountain.
translation.it: Troveremo le loro tracce sulle montagne.

translation.en: HENRY: Was it the right decision? Leaving the boat?
translation.it: È stata la scelta giusta lasciare la barca?

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] The Ree own that river. They would've flanked us.
translation.it: Gli Arikara controllano il fiume. Ci avrebbero accerchiato.

translation.en: We stay east of the Grand through the mountains... ...we cut a week off our trip.
translation.it: Restiamo a est del Grand, per i monti, e arriveremo una settimana prima.

translation.en: Lands are bone dry up there. Nothing for the Ree to hunt.
translation.it: Il terreno è secco. Non c'è niente che gli Arikara possano cacciare.

translation.en: HENRY: Except us.
GLASS: Except us.
Is it true what Fitzgerald said?
translation.it: È vero quello che ha detto Fitzgerald?

translation.en: Is that why you came out here to the edge of the world?
translation.it: È per questo che sei venuto qui, ai confini del mondo?

translation.en: I do like the quiet.
Your boy...
...he's seen a lot.
He got a mother you need to get him back to?
translation.it: Ha una madre a cui devi riportarlo?

translation.en: JIM: Mr. Glass!
There are cubs here!
We got cubs here!
Christ Almighty.
He's down here!
ANDERSON: Keep your eyes open. There's bears around.
translation.it: Fate molta attenzione. Ci sono orsi in giro.

translation.en: JIM: I need your help now!
HENRY: Oh, my God.
Get me rags now!
Give me rags before he bleeds out. Rags.
translation.it: Datemi delle bende o morirà dissanguato. Degli stracci.

translation.en: Prepare the kit. Bridger! You hold that.
translation.it: Prepara i medicinali. Bridger! Tieni premuto qui.

translation.en: Easy. Oh, my God.
ANDERSON: Got to give him credit for taking that grizz down with him.
translation.it: Gli dobbiamo molto rispetto per aver ammazzato quel grizzly.

translation.en: He shouldn't have shot. The place is crawling with tree niggers.
translation.it: Non avrebbe dovuto sparare. Quei cazzo di musi rossi arriveranno dappertutto.

translation.en: HENRY: That's enough! That's enough! We're still in Ree territory.
translation.it: Basta! Questo è territorio degli Arikara.

translation.en: He's one of our own men.
Scout a circle around us. North and west. Take those two with you.
translation.it: Perlustriamo il perimetro. A nord e a ovest. Porta con te questi due.

translation.en: Bill, Fryman, you take south and east. Watch for anyone that might've heard that shot.
translation.it: Bill, Fryman, andate a sud e a est. Attenti a chiunque abbia sentito lo sparo.

translation.en: We have to stitch him up.
[IN ENGLISH] What about me? Captain?
You just stay here.
Hold it down.
JIM: I'm so sorry, Mr. Glass. HENRY: Bridger, press down here.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace, sig. Glass. - Bridger, premi qui.

translation.en: JIM: He's bleeding down here, too.
ANDERSON: They're torturing the bastard.
The proper thing to do would be to finish him off quick.
translation.it: La cosa migliore sarebbe finirlo alla svelta.

translation.en: Unless he has a chance of pulling through.
translation.it: A meno che non abbia una possibilità di farcela.

translation.en: Pulling through?
You saw what that grizz did to him. -He'll be dead inside an hour. -Mm-hm.
translation.it: Hai visto cosa gli ha fatto quel grizzly. Sarà morto entro un'ora.

translation.en: Yeah, we all will be if he don't quit wailing like that.
translation.it: Lo saremo tutti, se non la smette di urlare.

translation.en: Toward you and twist it into place. I'll hold him. Go.
translation.it: Tirala verso di te, rimettila in posizione. Lo tengo fermo. Fallo.

translation.en: -Pa. HENRY: Hold him. Go.
Go!
Now!
He passed out.
I'll take advantage and stitch up his neck.
translation.it: Ne approfitto per mettergli i punti al collo.

translation.en: Water.
Bridger, tell the others we'll camp here tonight.
translation.it: Bridger, di' loro che stanotte ci accamperemo qui.

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm right here.
I'll be right here...
[IN FRENCH] Toussaint, he's here.
[IN FRENCH] I thought he wouldn't make it.
translation.it: Non pensavo che ce l'avrebbe fatta.

translation.en: I'm glad you made it here.
translation.it: Sono contento che tu sia qui.

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] We need horses and rifles.
We bring you many pelts.
No horses... just what we agreed.
translation.it: No, niente cavalli... solo quello che avevamo detto.

translation.en: Take all the pelts you want.
translation.it: Prendete tutte le pelli che volete.

translation.en: We need horses and rifles.
I need a woman with big tits...
translation.it: E io vorrei una donna con le tette grosse...

translation.en: Who can cook.
INTERPRETER [IN ARIKARA]: We can't give you any horses.
TOUSSAINT: What's he saying?
INTERPRETER [IN FRENCH]: I don't know, something about horses.
translation.it: Non lo so, qualcosa a proposito di cavalli.

translation.en: Bring us something to drink... some whiskey.
translation.it: Portaci qualcosa da bere... del whisky.

translation.en: Tell him to stop asking about the horses.
translation.it: Digli di smetterla di chiedere dei cavalli.

translation.en: Always good doing business with you.
translation.it: Facciamo sempre buoni affari con voi.

translation.en: Horses.
No horses.
All we can trade are guns and ammunition.
translation.it: Possiamo solo dare fucili e munizioni.

translation.en: Tell him if he asks about horses again, there is no deal.
translation.it: Digli che se ci chiede ancora cavalli, l'accordo salta.

translation.en: Where did you get these? The Americans?
translation.it: Dove le avete prese queste? Dagli americani?

translation.en: They're already branded.
I'll only be able to get half price for them.
translation.it: Potrò ottenere solo metà prezzo per queste.

translation.en: Get him away from there.
I said no horses.
[IN ARIKARA] We'll take these three horses.
I'm not going to say it again.
They aren't part of the deal.
Now tell your man to step away.
translation.it: Ora di' al tuo uomo di allontanarsi.

translation.en: We had an agreement, you have to honor it.
[IN FRENCH] You stand there and talk to me about honor?
translation.it: Tu stai qui e parli a me di onore?

translation.en: INTERPRETER: I told you he speaks French.
translation.it: Ve l'avevo detto che parla francese.

translation.en: Those pelts are stolen.
[IN ARIKARA] You all have stolen everything from us.
Everything!
The land.
The animals.
Two white men snuck into our village, and took my daughter, Powaqa.
translation.it: Due uomini bianchi si sono intrufolati nel nostro villaggio e hanno preso mia figlia, Powaqa.

translation.en: We leave you these pelts because honor demands it.
translation.it: Vi lasciamo queste pelli perché ce lo chiede il nostro onore.

translation.en: I take your horses to find my daughter.
translation.it: Prendo i vostri cavalli per cercare mia figlia.

translation.en: You are free to try and stop me.
translation.it: Siete liberi di fermarmi se volete.

translation.en: Business is business.
Prepare five horses for them.
HENRY: I want everybody up at the crack of dawn.
translation.it: Vi voglio tutti in piedi alle prime luci dell'alba.

translation.en: Carrying Glass will be hard, so we need to get ahead as far as possible.
translation.it: Trasportare Glass sarà faticoso, dobbiamo avanzare il più in fretta possibile.

translation.en: We'll divide into two groups.
Fitzgerald, Jones, Fryman, you take the east side of the river.
translation.it: Fitzgerald, Jones, Fryman, andate sul versante est del fiume,

translation.en: Anderson, you scout up front.
That claw don't belong to you.
It ain't for me.
Stop!
HENRY: Don't let him down! Don't let him down!
ANDERSON: Watch it.
JONES: How we gonna make it up this? FITZGERALD: Slow down.
translation.it: - Come faremo a salire di qua? - Rallenta.

translation.en: ANDERSON: It's killing us, captain!
HENRY: Lift it, Bridger!
FITZGERALD: Goddamn it, keep it steady.
JIM: Lift it up higher. HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I am.
HENRY: And heave!
JONES: I'll go up and pull.
translation.it: Vado davanti e lo tiro su.

translation.en: My foot!
Enough of this shit!
We'll never make it across like this, captain.
translation.it: Non ce la faremo mai a superare questa parete, Capitano.

translation.en: He's burning up.
Cap'n, you ain't doing us nor him no favors...
translation.it: Capitano, non fa un favore né a lui né a noi,

translation.en: ...by letting him go on suffering like this.
Captain, it's all the same up here.
translation.it: Capitano, quassù la situazione è la stessa.

translation.en: We're gonna have to go back. Find another way.
translation.it: Dobbiamo tornare indietro. Trovare un'altra strada.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
Lay that rag over his eyes, Mr. Bridger.
translation.it: Mettigli una benda sugli occhi, Bridger.

translation.en: HAWK: What?
HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. HAWK: Wait!
translation.it: - Mettigli una benda sugli occhi. - Aspetta!

translation.en: HENRY: I'm sorry, Hugh.
JIM: Sir, I can't do that.
HAWK: How do we get back without him? Only he knows the way.
translation.it: Come facciamo a tornare senza di lui? Solo lui conosce la strada.

translation.en: HENRY: Lay the rag over his eyes. JIM: I can't.
Wait! How do we get back--
HENRY: Lay it over his eyes!
Step back.
HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: Bridger, stop! Bridger, Henry. Henry! Henry, please.
translation.it: Bridger, fermo! Bridger, Henry. Henry! Ti prego.

translation.en: Captain. Captain. Please. Please leave....
There's a $70 bonus from the Rocky Mountain Fur Company to the two men...
translation.it: La Rocky Mountain Fur Company darà 70 dollari ai due uomini

translation.en: ...that stay with Glass to see this through.
translation.it: che resteranno con Glass finché non sarà finita.

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH]: I'll stay!
Me too. Money or not, I'll stay.
translation.it: Anch'io. Soldi o non soldi, resto.

translation.en: I'll need a third.
Sorry, captain.
I have a family. I'm not crazy.
translation.it: Ho una famiglia. Non sono pazzo.

translation.en: Captain, three men can't hold off a party of Ree... ...much less some boys.
translation.it: Capitano, tre uomini non bastano contro gli Arikara, tantomeno dei ragazzi.

translation.en: Besides, $70 ain't gonna buy nobody a new set of ears.
translation.it: E 70 dollari non bastano a comprare un nuovo paio di orecchi.

translation.en: A hundred, then.
This man is the only reason we're still alive.
translation.it: È grazie a quest'uomo se siamo ancora vivi.

translation.en: We were 45 men when this started. Now we're ten. Almost nine.
translation.it: Avevamo 45 uomini, quando siamo partiti. Ora siamo in dieci. Nove, quasi.

translation.en: HAWK: He's my father. He can have my share.
translation.it: È mio padre. Può avere la mia parte.

translation.en: JIM: Mine too. He can have my share also.
All right.
If Mr. Bridger feels the same way, I'll lag behind with them.
translation.it: Se il sig. Bridger la pensa come voi, resterò con loro.

translation.en: -You? -Yep.
You already lost my share of the pelts...
translation.it: Hai quasi perso la mia quota di pelli,

translation.en: ...so I got no choice but to make it up by some other means.
translation.it: posso solo rifarmi in altro modo.

translation.en: Sticking around for another day or two don't make no difference.
translation.it: Restare qui un altro paio di giorni non cambierà niente.

translation.en: $300, at least I get to go home with something.
translation.it: Trecento dollari. Almeno porterò qualcosa a casa.

translation.en: Glass is to be cared for until, understood?
translation.it: Dovrete prendervi cura di Glass fino alla fine, d'accordo?

translation.en: Yeah. You have my word. I understand.
translation.it: Sì. Hai la mia parola. Lo capisco.

translation.en: HENRY: You boys get him down off this slope... ...and somewhere safe before dark.
translation.it: Portatelo giù. Portatelo al sicuro prima che faccia buio.

translation.en: -Fitzgerald. FITZGERALD: Captain.
Glass is to be cared for as long as necessary.
translation.it: Prenditi cura di Glass finché sarà necessario.

translation.en: And a proper burial when it's time. He's earned it.
translation.it: E dagli una degna sepoltura quando sarà il momento. Se l'è meritata.

translation.en: I understand.
You hurt yourself?
ANDERSON: I'll be fine.
HAWK [IN PAWNEE]: Can you hear that wind, father?
Remember what mother used to say about the wind?
translation.it: Ricordi cosa diceva la mamma del vento?

translation.en: The wind cannot defeat a tree with strong roots.
translation.it: Il vento non può sconfiggere un albero con forti radici.

translation.en: You are still breathing...
I miss her so much.
GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: I will be right here...
I'm right here.
As long as you can still grab a breath, you fight.
translation.it: Finché ti resta anche un solo respiro, combatti.

translation.en: You breathe. Keep breathing.
WIFE [IN PAWNEE]: When there is a storm...
And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.it: E sei davanti a un albero...

translation.en: If you look at the branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.it: Se guardi i suoi rami, giureresti che sta per cadere.

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.it: Ma se guardi il tronco, capirai quanto è stabile.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Three hundred bucks goes a long way toward retirement.
translation.it: Trecento dollari ti portano molto vicino alla pensione.

translation.en: Go down to Texas, find me a decent piece of land, and start pissing in the wind.
translation.it: Me ne vado in Texas, mi trovo un pezzo di terra decente e mi rilasso.

translation.en: Get me the hell out of this godforsaken place.
translation.it: Me ne vado da questo posto maledetto da Dio.

translation.en: JIM: Ree done that to you?
translation.it: Te lo hanno fatto gli Arikara?

translation.en: I'm just asking.
Yeah, they done it.
They took their sweet time with it.
At the start, I didn't feel nothing. I just heard the sound...
translation.it: All'inizio non ho sentito niente. Ho sentito solo il suono

translation.en: ...of the knife scraping against my skull...
translation.it: del coltello che grattava lo scalpo

translation.en: ...and them all laughing and whooping and hollering and whatnot.
translation.it: e le loro risate e le loro grida di esultanza.

translation.en: Then the blood came.
It was cold. It started streaming down my face, in my eyes...
translation.it: Era freddo. Ha iniziato a colarmi sulla faccia, sugli occhi

translation.en: ...and breathing it in.
translation.it: e poi nelle narici e in bocca.

translation.en: Choking on it.
That's when I felt it.
Yeah, felt all of it.
I got my head turned inside out.
translation.it: Mi hanno tirato via lo scalpo.

translation.en: JIM: Jesus.
Them Indians down Texas way...
...they may rob you, but they ain't gonna take your topknot.
translation.it: ti rapinano, ma non ti tolgono il ciuffo.

translation.en: JIM: When was it?
Goddamn it, will you quit that noise now, will you?
translation.it: Diamine, vuoi piantarla con quel rumore?

translation.en: Quit it.
FITZGERALD: I'm falling further back... ...from Henry and the boys on account of tending to you.
translation.it: Resto indietro rispetto a Henry e agli altri per badare a te.

translation.en: Got to get up the damn mountain, but winter keeps chasing us down.
translation.it: Dobbiamo risalire quella dannata parete, ma l'inverno ce lo impedirà.

translation.en: If you ready to take the sacrament...
translation.it: Se sei pronto per l'estrema unzione,

translation.en: ...I can do that for you.
What you holding to, Glass?
translation.it: A che cosa ti aggrappi, Glass?

translation.en: You know...
...it would be better...
...if you were to take that last breath of yours now... ...for all of us.
translation.it: se tu esalassi adesso l'ultimo respiro. Sarebbe meglio per tutti.

translation.en: Now you hung tough.
And that's something.
I'm begging you.
Them Ree are so close I can smell 'em. You can smell 'em too.
translation.it: Gli Arikara sono vicini, li sento nell'aria. Li senti anche tu.

translation.en: You got to think of your boy. All right? 'Cause you're gonna kill him.
translation.it: Devi pensare al tuo ragazzo, no? Perché così lo farai uccidere.

translation.en: You'll kill us all.
I can muzzle you if you like.
Take away this suffering quick and easy. No one ever has to know that you give up.
translation.it: Posso porre fine a questo dolore subito. Nessuno saprà mai che hai mollato.

translation.en: All you have to do is blink if you want me to do that.
translation.it: Devi solo battere gli occhi, se vuoi che lo faccia.

translation.en: Save your boy and blink.
translation.it: Salva il tuo ragazzo, batti gli occhi.

translation.en: You just have to blink.
Yeah. There it is.
You'd best hope the good Lord'll get His ass here quick, huh?
translation.it: Sarà meglio che preghi che il buon Dio arrivi presto.

translation.en: Maybe He'll forgive your sins, maybe not.
translation.it: Forse perdonerà i tuoi peccati, forse no.

translation.en: Thus I do commend thee to the Lord.
translation.it: Ti lascio nelle mani del Signore.

translation.en: Through Jesus Christ the Lord of all reality and mercy...
translation.it: Per Gesù Cristo che è Signore di tutte le cose e della misericordia.

translation.en: ...and the Father and the Creator, I hold thee--
translation.it: Che il Padre, il Creatore, ti tenga...

translation.en: HAWK [IN ENGLISH] Get away! Get away!
You okay? Jim! Jim! Help!
HAWK: Help! -Calm down.
Jim! Help!
Don't shout! You're gonna get us all killed!
translation.it: Non gridare! Ci farai uccidere tutti!

translation.en: Keep away! I'll tell the captain what you did. They'll hang you!
translation.it: Allontanati! Dirò al capitano cosa hai fatto. Ti impiccheranno!

translation.en: -They'll hang you! Jim, help! -We have an understanding.
translation.it: - Ti impiccheranno! Jim, aiuto! - Avevamo un patto.

translation.en: What's fucking wrong with you people?
translation.it: Che cazzo avete in testa, voi selvaggi?

translation.en: Shit.
JIM: I got one beaver, Hawk.
Breathing changed?
translation.it: Il respiro di Glass è cambiato?

translation.en: I hadn't noticed.
Damn, he's cold as ice.
translation.it: Diamine, è freddo come il ghiaccio.

translation.en: Here you go, Mr. Glass. This will help you. Keep you warm.
translation.it: Ecco qua, sig. Glass. Questo ti terrà al caldo.

translation.en: It's all right.
Where's Hawk?
He ain't with you?
I understand, Mr. Glass.
It's all right. I think I'll get a fire going.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Accendo un fuoco.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Yeah. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.it: Sì. Mi sembra una buona idea.

translation.en: JIM: Hawk!
FITZGERALD [WHISPERING]: Shh. Ree.
There's about 20 of them down by the creek.
translation.it: Ce ne sono una ventina, giù al torrente.

translation.en: They're headed this way. Grab your shit and let's go.
translation.it: Vengono da questa parte. Prendi la tua roba e andiamocene.

translation.en: Shit. What do we do?
FITZGERALD: Run, right now.
-What about Hawk? -He ain't our problem no more.
translation.it: - E Hawk? - Non è più un problema nostro.

translation.en: We can't just leave him.
Either he's gutted or scalped. And if he ain't he can find us, can't he?
translation.it: Sarà già sventrato e scotennato. Se così non fosse, ci troverà, no?

translation.en: What about Glass?
He ain't our problem. Like us, he's on his own.
translation.it: Non è un nostro problema. È da solo, come noi.

translation.en: We made a promise to the captain. A proper burial when the time was needed.
translation.it: L'abbiamo promesso al capitano. Una degna sepoltura, a tempo debito.

translation.en: He needs that rifle!
He couldn't do nothing with it if you tarred it to his hand.
translation.it: Non riuscirebbe a farci niente neanche se glielo attaccassi alla mano.

translation.en: We can't do this.
We got no fucking choice.
JIM: No, we can't. Look at him.
All right, shit, then, buddy. Get him up. You want to take him?
translation.it: Va bene. Merda, amico. Allora tiralo su. Vuoi portarlo con noi?

translation.en: Come on now!
JIM: Easy. Slowly, Fitz. Easy with him.
translation.it: Piano. Lentamente, Fitz. Fa' con calma.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Just get your shit. Get your shit!
translation.it: Prendi la tua roba e basta. Fallo!

translation.en: Shut up.
Shut up!
JIM: Hold up!
Fitz. What are you doing?
What does it look like? Proper burial. Like you wanted.
translation.it: Che ti sembra? Una degna sepoltura, come volevi tu.

translation.en: JIM: No, not like this.
FITZGERALD: Why not?
He's alive, Fitz. He's alive.
So shoot him.
I have to go. I have to go.
I'm sorry, Mr. Glass. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, sig. Glass. Mi spiace.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
MURPHY: Captain! This way!
There's a path down here!
ANDERSON: There ain't shit down there! We got to climb over!
translation.it: Non c'è niente, di qua! Dobbiamo attraversare!

translation.en: JONES: Glass said to stay east! ANDERSON: Glass can go to hell!
translation.it: - Glass ha detto di andare a est! - Glass può andare all'inferno!

translation.en: HENRY: What's the map say?
Keep climbing. We climb, Captain. We keep climbing.
translation.it: Di continuare a salire. Saliremo, Capitano. Continueremo.

translation.en: Till we reach Old Gabe.
translation.it: Finché non incontreremo il vecchio San Gabriele.

translation.en: We climb.
We got to wait for Murph.
ANDERSON: Yeah. You wait for him.
Captain?
Sir...
...Murphy says there's a way down there. Who we following?
translation.it: Murphy dice che c'è un sentiero, laggiù. Chi seguiamo?

translation.en: ANDERSON: You follow who you want! I'm going up!
translation.it: Segui chi ti pare! Io vado su!

translation.en: Stubby, keep going up! JONES: Murph! Come here!
translation.it: - Stubby, continua a salire! - Murph! Andiamo!

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm not leaving you, son.
I'm right here.
FITZGERALD: Fire's done.
I can't even feel my feet.
translation.it: Non mi sento neanche i piedi.

translation.en: Didn't we put enough distance between us and them Ree?
translation.it: Non abbiamo messo già abbastanza distanza tra noi e gli Arikara?

translation.en: A dozen Ree can make twice as good time as we can.
translation.it: Una dozzina di Arikara si muovono al doppio della nostra velocità.

translation.en: -Twenty. -What?
You said you saw twenty Ree. Yeah? What you talking about?
translation.it: - Hai detto di aver visto venti Arikara. - Di che parli?

translation.en: -You woke me up. -Mm-hm.
You said you saw twenty Ree by the creek.
translation.it: Hai detto di aver visto venti Arikara al torrente.

translation.en: Well, yeah, twenty, a dozen...
...it don't matter. I wasn't gonna hang around counting fucking feathers.
translation.it: non ha importanza. Non volevo attardarmi per contare le loro dannate penne.

translation.en: As a matter of fact...
...what was you doing down by the creek all by yourself?
translation.it: che facevi al torrente tutto solo?

translation.en: I'd already brought up plenty of water.
translation.it: Avevo già portato su acqua in abbondanza.

translation.en: Answer me, Fitzgerald. I asked you a question.
Don't question me on account of you feel guilty.
translation.it: Non farmi domande solo perché ti senti in colpa.

translation.en: Answer me or I'll blow your head off.
translation.it: Rispondimi o ti faccio saltare le cervella.

translation.en: You got a short memory, boy.
translation.it: Hai una memoria a breve termine, ragazzo.

translation.en: Your ass would be floating around the Missouri right now... ...if it wasn't for me.
translation.it: Il tuo culo starebbe galleggiando nel Missouri, se non fosse per me.

translation.en: You want to ask questions?
What you want to ask? If you want to know, ask it.
translation.it: Cosa vuoi chiedermi? Se vuoi sapere, chiedi.

translation.en: You want to know why you left Mr. Glass back there for dead, huh?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere perché hai dato Glass per morto e lo hai lasciato laggiù?

translation.en: Or why you left your little boyfriend running around?
translation.it: O perché hai lasciato il tuo amichetto a correre qua e là?

translation.en: You want to know if he's still alive?
translation.it: Vuoi sapere se è ancora vivo?

translation.en: I'll tell you why. It's 'cause you ain't a man yet.
translation.it: Te lo dico io. Perché non sei ancora un uomo.

translation.en: It's 'cause you was scared shitless. You're scared now.
translation.it: Perché te la fai sotto dalla paura. Hai paura anche adesso.

translation.en: The Ree.
What of them?
Tell me, did you see 'em?
-Put your rifle down. -Did you see the Ree?
translation.it: - Abbassa il fucile. - Hai visto gli Arikara?

translation.en: Not a single one.
You fucking lied to me? You lied to me!
translation.it: Mi hai mentito, cazzo? Mi hai mentito!

translation.en: I had to scare some sense into you, boy.
translation.it: Dovevo metterti paura per farti ragionare, ragazzo.

translation.en: Glass was dead. Hawk we don't know about.
translation.it: Glass era morto. Forse anche Hawk.

translation.en: No point in either of us dying either, you understand?
translation.it: Non c'era motivo di morire con loro, lo capisci?

translation.en: The way I see it, I saved your life twice now. I ought to be God to you.
translation.it: È la seconda volta che ti salvo la vita. Sono come Dio, per te.

translation.en: And God giveth and God taketh away.
translation.it: Il Signore dà, il Signore toglie.

translation.en: Lucky fucker.
Next time you want to shoot somebody...
translation.it: La prossima volta che spari a qualcuno,

translation.en: ...you might want to use powder, prime your rifle.
translation.it: vedi di caricare la polvere da sparo, di preparare il fucile.

translation.en: Come on. Let's git. Grab your shit.
translation.it: Andiamo. Muoviamoci. Prendi la tua roba.

translation.en: Fresh blood. This could be Powaqa.
translation.it: Sangue fresco. Potrebbe essere di Powaqa.

translation.en: [IN ARIKARA] A dead boy.
[IN ARIKARA] A Pawnee boy.
Let's go.
Who did this?
translation.it: Chi è stato a fare questo?

translation.en: FITZGERALD: I don't know.
Could be Captain Leavenworth's boys.
translation.it: Forse gli uomini del capitano Leavenworth.

translation.en: Put some eyes on the back of your head.
translation.it: Tieni gli occhi aperti anche dietro le spalle.

translation.en: These Injuns ain't never as dead as you think they are.
translation.it: Questi indiani non sono mai morti anche se lo sembrano.

translation.en: Look at 'em, huh? They're always stealing our shit.
translation.it: Guardali. Sempre a rubare la nostra roba.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We got horses over here!
Hey, Bridger.
We got horses!
JIM: What you want to do about these pigs?
translation.it: Cosa vuoi farci con questi maiali?

translation.en: FITZGERALD: The Lord's on our side, kid.
translation.it: Il Signore è al tuo fianco, ragazzo.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: You all right there, kid?
Your head in the right place?
I guess.
I can't help thinking about whether we did the right--
translation.it: Continuo a chiedermi se abbiamo fatto la cosa giusta.

translation.en: Ain't our place to wonder. The good Lord...
translation.it: Non c'è tempo per le domande.

translation.en: ...got us on a road whether we choose it or not.
translation.it: Il buon Dio ci ha messo su questo cammino, che ci piaccia o meno.

translation.en: My pop, he weren't a religious man, you know?
translation.it: Mio padre non era un uomo di fede, lo sai?

translation.en: If you couldn't grow it, kill it, or eat it, he just plain old didn't believe in it.
translation.it: Se non potevi crescere, uccidere o mangiare una cosa semplicemente non ci credeva.

translation.en: And this one time he head on up the old Saba hills. San Saba hills?
translation.it: Un giorno andò verso le colline di Saba. Conosci le San Saba Hills?

translation.en: He joined a couple Texas Ranger buddies of his to hunt.
translation.it: Aveva raggiunto un paio di Texas Ranger per cacciare.

translation.en: Pretty routine. He done it like a hundred times before.
translation.it: Era una cosa abituale. Lo aveva già fatto centinaia di volte.

translation.en: Should have been a 3-day kill, but on the second day... ...it all went fucked.
translation.it: Doveva essere una battuta da tre giorni, ma il secondo giorno andò tutto in malora.

translation.en: Somehow that night he lost his buddies. And to top it off...
translation.it: Nella notte, in qualche modo, aveva perso i suoi compagni. E oltretutto

translation.en: ...them Comanches went and took the horses.
translation.it: i Comanche avevano rubato i cavalli.

translation.en: So he was starving and delirious...
translation.it: Stava morendo di fame, era delirante

translation.en: ...and he crawls up into this mott...
...this group of trees out in the middle of nowhere... ...just sticking up in this ocean of scrub...
translation.it: un gruppo di alberi in mezzo al nulla, spuntati in un oceano di macchia.

translation.en: ...and he found religion.
At that moment, he told me...
...he found God.
And it turns out that God....
He's a squirrel.
Yeah. A big, old meaty one.
"I found God," he used to say.
"And while sitting there and basking in the glory and sublimity of mercy...
translation.it: "E mentre mi crogiolavo nella gloria e nella sublime misericordia,

translation.en: ...I shot and ate that son of a bitch."
translation.it: ho sparato e mi sono mangiato quel figlio di puttana."

translation.en: Yeah. You might want to close your eyes, kid.
translation.it: Già. Forse vuoi chiudere gli occhi per un po', ragazzo.

translation.en: [IN PAWNEE] I'm injured.
[IN PAWNEE] What happened to you?
A bear.
A bear.
[IN ENGLISH] Grizzly.
[IN PAWNEE] My men... left me for dead.
translation.it: I miei uomini mi hanno abbandonato credendomi morto.

translation.en: Killed my son.
I lost my family too.
translation.it: Ho perso anche io la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Sioux killed my people.
translation.it: I Sioux hanno ucciso la mia gente.

translation.en: I'm going south to find more Pawnee.
translation.it: Vado a sud a cercare altri Pawnee.

translation.en: My heart bleeds...
But revenge is in the creator's hands.
translation.it: Ma la vendetta è nelle mani di Dio.

translation.en: You will ride with me...
HIKUC: Your body is rotten.
Need to heal.
You could die.
FITZGERALD: Yeah! There she is.
We did it.
You ought to be proud of yourself, boy.
Yeah.
We followed orders. We just skipped the funeral part.
translation.it: Abbiamo seguito gli ordini. Abbiamo solo omesso il funerale.

translation.en: Don't go down there and start growing no conscience.
translation.it: Non farti venire una coscienza, una volta laggiù.

translation.en: 'Cause sure as night'll come they'll have us swinging from a couple ropes.
translation.it: Perché, sicuro come la notte, ci faranno penzolare da una corda.

translation.en: We did what we had to do.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto ciò che dovevamo fare.

translation.en: FITZGERALD: We had the extra day so we managed to dig...
translation.it: Avevamo un giorno in più, così abbiamo scavato

translation.en: ...a little deeper, lay rocks on top so scavengers couldn't get at him.
translation.it: a fondo, mettendoci sopra delle rocce per tenere i predatori lontani.

translation.en: It was done right and all. He was buried right.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto le cose per bene. È stato seppellito in modo corretto.

translation.en: -Sir, can we-- -The truth is that...
translation.it: - Signore, possiamo... - La verità è che,

translation.en: ...ahem, when Hawk disappeared, I was worried about savages.
translation.it: con la scomparsa di Hawk, ero preoccupato per i selvaggi.

translation.en: And I was ready to get, to move on out.
translation.it: Ero pronto ad andarmene, a partire.

translation.en: Yeah, but Bridger here argued to stay.
He argued to stay...
...so he could at least build a cross or something...
translation.it: per poter costruire una croce o qualcosa

translation.en: ...to put on top of Glass's grave, and that's what he did. That's what we did.
translation.it: da mettere sopra la tomba di Glass, ed è quello che abbiamo fatto.

translation.en: I'm glad you pulled your weight, Mr. Bridger.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu abbia fatto il tuo dovere.

translation.en: He more than pulled his weight, captain. This man here, he was my partner.
translation.it: Ha fatto anche di più, Capitano. Quest'uomo è stato il mio compagno.

translation.en: Am I to assume that the agreed arrangement did not change?
translation.it: Posso presumere che i termini dell'accordo non siano cambiati?

translation.en: Uh, fortunately for me, it did not.
translation.it: Fortunatamente per me, non lo sono.

translation.en: Thank you...
...for your courage, honor, and service.
translation.it: per il vostro coraggio e il vostro onore, per il vostro servizio.

translation.en: Deal or no deal, Mr. Bridger, you deserve something for what you did.
translation.it: Accordo o non accordo, sig. Bridger, meriti qualcosa per ciò che hai fatto.

translation.en: Thank you.
Kid's been beating himself up awful bad the whole trip.
translation.it: Il ragazzo non ha fatto che biasimarsi per tutto il viaggio.

translation.en: We all saw the shape Glass was in.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto tutti com'era messo Glass.

translation.en: There was no more to be done. Right?
translation.it: Non c'era altro da fare. Giusto?

translation.en: FITZGERALD: Yeah.
We all saw him.
WIFE: When there is a storm...
And you stand in front of a tree...
translation.it: E sei davanti a un albero...

translation.en: If you look at its branches, you swear it will fall.
translation.it: Se guardi i suoi rami, giureresti che sta per cadere.

translation.en: But if you watch the trunk, you will see its stability.
translation.it: Ma se guardi il tronco, capirai quanto è stabile.

translation.en: SCOUT [IN ARIKARA]: There are traces of a camp...
translation.it: Ci sono tracce di un accampamento...

translation.en: There are traces of a camp...
translation.it: Ci sono tracce di un accampamento...

translation.en: Where?
Entering the moon forest.
Maybe from two days ago. They are moving east.
translation.it: Forse risalgono a due giorni fa. Muovono verso est.

translation.en: Tell the others.
Let's move quickly. Powaqa could be with them!
translation.it: Muoviamoci in fretta, Powaqa potrebbe essere con loro!

translation.en: TOUSSAINT [IN FRENCH]: Bring me the girl...
Those five horses weren't for free.
translation.it: Quei cinque cavalli non erano gratuiti.

translation.en: [IN ENGLISH] Don't make a sound.
GLASS [IN PAWNEE]: I will get a horse.
POWAQA [IN ARIKARA]: I'll cut off your balls.
MAN [IN FRENCH]: Where is Toussaint?
GLASS: Come here...
FITZGERALD: May I join you? HENRY: Yes.
-Yeah? -Yes.
I was wondering when we might be getting paid for that haul.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo quando verremo pagati per quelle pelli.

translation.en: 'Cause them pelts we collected are still out there, you know...
translation.it: Perché quelle che abbiamo raccolto sono ancora là,

translation.en: ...under a couple foot of dirt and snow. But that ain't my fault.
translation.it: sotto mezzo metro di terra e neve. Ma non per colpa mia.

translation.en: I'm waiting for Captain Leavenworth to arrive with his army.
translation.it: Aspetto l'arrivo del capitano Leavenworth e del suo esercito.

translation.en: Then we'll have enough men...
...to shoot some civilization into those fucking Arikara and get back our pelts.
translation.it: per infliggere un po' di civiltà a quei dannati Arikara e riprenderci le pelli.

translation.en: All right. All right.
When's that supposed to happen?
I don't know.
But until then, nobody gets paid.
translation.it: Ma fino ad allora, nessuno verrà pagato.

translation.en: Listen here, all right?
I was hired to trap 'em. I wasn't hired to guard 'em.
translation.it: Mi hanno assunto per prenderle, non per custodirle.

translation.en: The way I see it, now you, you got a safe.
translation.it: Per quanto ne so, hai una cassaforte.

translation.en: It's probably full of money.
You signed a contract to protect your boss... ...and your boss's property.
translation.it: Hai firmato un contratto, promettendo di proteggere il tuo capo e i suoi averi.

translation.en: And that safe isn't full anymore. It's short about $300.
translation.it: E quella cassaforte non è più piena. Mancano circa 300 dollari.

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
It means, according to my records...
...you purchased more goods on the expedition...
translation.it: hai comprato più articoli dalla spedizione

translation.en: ...than what you are owed by the company.
translation.it: di quanti te ne siano dovuti dalla compagnia.

translation.en: Now, Happy New Year, Fitzgerald.
GUARD: Fryman! White man at the gate!
Speak English.
[IN ENGLISH] I have no weapon.
Open her up!
Get the captain!
HENRY: Where are your men?
All dead.
Who was he?
I don't know. Something to eat, please?
translation.it: Non lo so. Del cibo, per favore?

translation.en: Food comes at a price.
-I have no money. -Then you don't eat.
translation.it: - Non ho denaro. - Allora non mangerai.

translation.en: Give back some of them stolen pelts you buy from the Injuns.
translation.it: Rendici quelle pelli rubate e comprate dai pellerossa.

translation.en: -Not now, Jones. -Huh? Silver. How is this? Silver.
translation.it: - Non ora, Jones. - Argento. Che ne dici? Argento.

translation.en: This all you got?
We was nine.
My friend, he die in the snow.
translation.it: Il mio amico è morto nella neve.

translation.en: And the other was...
...kill by wolf. I see it.
translation.it: ucciso da un lupo. L'ho visto.

translation.en: By wolf, yeah, kill.
Where'd you get this?
Canteen.
He drop it. He kill Toussaint, he drop it--
translation.it: L'ha lasciata cadere dopo che ha ucciso Toussaint.

translation.en: -Who? Who? -I don't know. I don't see.
translation.it: - Chi? - Non lo so. Non ho visto.

translation.en: It could be Hawk.
Yeah, could be.
JONES: That half-breed runt couldn't steal no horse.
translation.it: Quel nano meticcio non saprebbe rubare un cavallo.

translation.en: -Maybe it was Weston. STUBBY BILL: Or Beckett.
How far from here?
Thirty mile. Northwest, near the Yellowstone. The Yellowstone!
translation.it: A 50 chilometri, vicino al fiume Yellowstone. Yellowstone!

translation.en: Get the horses saddled. Torches and supplies.
translation.it: Sellate i cavalli. Prendete torce e provviste.

translation.en: Ten dollars a man.
Anderson, you stay here.
ANDERSON: Yes, sir. Feed him and watch him.
translation.it: Sì, signore. Gli do da mangiare e lo tengo d'occhio.

translation.en: I'll get you a drink.
HENRY: When we get to the Yellowstone, we split into two groups!
translation.it: Una volta arrivati allo Yellowstone, ci divideremo in due gruppi!

translation.en: HENRY: Hawk!
JIM: Hawk, you out there?
HENRY: Keep your guard up!
Eyes in front!
Who are you?
FRYMAN: Beckett? Is that you?
HENRY: Glass?
Jesus Christ!
Jesus Christ, what happened?
[IN ENGLISH] Where is he?
HENRY: Jones, take him. Go.
I'm riding ahead. Bill, take Bridger.
Take Bridger!
-Have you seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
Get up. Get up!
-You seen Fitzgerald? -No, sir.
Whoa, easy. Where did he go?
-Who? -Fitzgerald. Where did he go?
-I have no idea. -Tell me or I'll take your head off.
translation.it: - Non ne ho idea. - Dimmelo o ti sparo in testa.

translation.en: I swear to God--
Tell me. Tell me!
Texas!
He said he was going to Texas. He said he was gonna reenlist.
translation.it: Diceva di voler andare in Texas. Diceva di volersi riarruolare.

translation.en: Then he started talking about property. "A decent piece of land."
translation.it: Ha iniziato a parlare di comprare "un pezzo di terra decente".

translation.en: He's heading for Texas. That's all I know.
translation.it: È diretto in Texas. So solo questo.

translation.en: Stay here.
Goddamn it!
Goddamn it!
GUARD: Jones! Get the Captain!
-Fryman! JONES: Open the gate!
GUARD: Open it up!
JONES: Murphy, get the Captain.
HENRY: Get him to the doctor. Now!
You said he was dead! You said he was dead!
I thought he was, I swear!
translation.it: Credevo che lo fosse, lo giuro!

translation.en: JIM: He lied to me! HENRY: You're a liar.
translation.it: - Mi ha mentito! - Sei un bugiardo.

translation.en: You left him out there!
Say the Lord's Prayer.
Say the Lord's Prayer!
Our Father, Who art in heaven. Who art-- I can't!
translation.it: Padre Nostro, che sei nei cieli. Sia... Non ci riesco!

translation.en: Shut up! Shut up!
From here out, you're a prisoner charged with treason!
translation.it: D'ora in poi, sei un prigioniero accusato di tradimento!

translation.en: Take him to the cage! Take him to the cage or you'll hang alongside him!
translation.it: Portalo in cella! Portalo in cella o ti faccio penzolare accanto a lui!

translation.en: I thought he was gonna die!
Fitz lied to me!
I couldn't help him!
Fitz lied to me!
How is he?
DOCTOR: He'll be fine, but there is swelling. He needs to rest.
translation.it: Starà bene, ma è ancora gonfio. Deve riposare.

translation.en: I'll be back to check up on him.
GLASS: He ran off, didn't he?
Bridger's telling the truth.
How's that?
Fitzgerald lied to him. He was just following orders.
translation.it: Fitzgerald gli ha mentito. Ha solo seguito gli ordini.

translation.en: He wasn't there when Fitzgerald stabbed my boy to death.
translation.it: Non c'era quando Fitzgerald ha pugnalato a morte mio figlio.

translation.en: Is that what happened?
He killed Hawk.
I need a horse and gun.
translation.it: Mi servono un cavallo e un fucile.

translation.en: No, you need to rest and eat. I'm going after him.
translation.it: No, ti serve cibo e riposo. Lo prenderò io.

translation.en: You'll never find him without me.
translation.it: Non lo troverai mai, senza di me.

translation.en: If we wait till morning he'll get away.
translation.it: Se aspettiamo che si faccia giorno, fuggirà.

translation.en: No, he won't.
He's afraid.
He knows how far I came for him.
translation.it: Sa quanta strada ho fatto per raggiungerlo.

translation.en: Same as that elk. When they get afraid, they run deep into the woods.
translation.it: Proprio come quell'alce. Se hanno paura, si rifugiano nel bosco.

translation.en: I got him trapped. He just doesn't know it yet.
translation.it: È in trappola. Solo che non lo sa ancora.

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
'Cause he has everything to lose.
All I had was that boy.
translation.it: Io avevo solo il mio ragazzo.

translation.en: And he took him from me.
I can't let you go back out there. Not again.
translation.it: Non posso farti tornare là fuori. Non di nuovo.

translation.en: I ain't afraid to die anymore.
translation.it: Io non ho paura di morire ormai.

translation.en: I done it already.
I'm going with you.
GLASS: That's his horse, all right.
translation.it: Sono le tracce del suo cavallo.

translation.en: No way he could've ridden through the night.
translation.it: Non è possibile che abbia cavalcato tutta la notte.

translation.en: HENRY: How far ahead?
Half a day at the most.
Could be Ree. If they aren't his, we lose him.
translation.it: Potrebbero essere degli Arikara. Se non sono sue, lo perderemo.

translation.en: Unless he reenlisted so he could justify killing again...
translation.it: A meno che non si sia riarruolato per poter uccidere ancora,

translation.en: ...these tracks right here are his.
HENRY: I can't remember my wife's face.
translation.it: Non ricordo il volto di mia moglie.

translation.en: Last week, she was still with me.
translation.it: Una settimana fa, quel ricordo era ancora con me.

translation.en: Now she's gone.
I worry I won't recognize her when I get back home.
translation.it: Temo di non riconoscerla, quando tornerò a casa.

translation.en: Is it true you killed an officer?
translation.it: È vero che hai ucciso un ufficiale?

translation.en: I just killed the man who was trying to kill my son.
translation.it: Ho ucciso l'uomo che cercava di uccidere mio figlio.

translation.en: Smoke.
How close?
No more than a mile up that way.
translation.it: Non più di un chilometro e mezzo, di là.

translation.en: I'm gonna head up to the west. You go down to the east.
translation.it: Andrò verso ovest. Tu va' verso est.

translation.en: See if we can find some tracks.
translation.it: Vediamo se riusciamo a trovare delle tracce.

translation.en: And if it's the Ree?
If it's the Ree, you turn right back around... ...and meet me back here. Tsk.
translation.it: Se sono gli Arikara, torna indietro e aspettami qui.

translation.en: Now, I wouldn't expect to find a man of your stature...
translation.it: Non mi aspettavo di trovare un uomo della tua levatura

translation.en: ...so far away from his stove on a morning as cold as this, captain.
translation.it: così lontano dalla stufa in una mattina tanto fredda, Capitano.

translation.en: You lost?
I'm here to take you back to Fort Kiowa...
translation.it: Sono qui per riportarti a Fort Kiowa,

translation.en: ...where you will be tried for murder.
Is that so?
I ain't crazy about your plan.
translation.it: Non è che il tuo piano mi faccia impazzire.

translation.en: Besides, I got one of my own.
translation.it: E poi, ne avrei uno anche io.

translation.en: We had a deal, Glass!
I tried to tell your boy, all right?
translation.it: Ho provato a dirlo al tuo ragazzo, va bene?

translation.en: I tried to tell him, but he wouldn't listen and he kept on screaming.
translation.it: Ho provato a dirglielo, ma non ascoltava e continuava a urlare.

translation.en: He was gonna get everybody killed.
But you and me, we had a deal.
translation.it: Avevamo un patto, tu e io.

translation.en: You know what happened out there.
And on my soul, the Lord, He knows...
translation.it: Lo giuro sulla mia anima, il Signore sa

translation.en: ...what happened out there.
There was no deal.
You killed my boy.
Well, maybe you should've raised a man, instead of some girlie little bitch.
translation.it: Forse avresti dovuto crescere un uomo, invece di una troietta effemminata.

translation.en: Goddamn it.
You came all this way just for your revenge, huh?
translation.it: Sei venuto fin qui per avere la tua vendetta, eh?

translation.en: Well, you enjoy it, Glass.
'Cause there ain't nothing gonna bring your boy back.
translation.it: Perché niente potrà restituirti tuo figlio.

translation.en: No, it won't.
[IN PAWNEE] Revenge is in God's hands...
translation.it: La vendetta è nelle mani di Dio...

translation.en: ...not mine.
